title: Trump’s Push to Ban Corporate Landlords
description: Trump wants to ban Wall Street investors from buying single-family homes. Would that actually help Americans trying to buy a house? Bloomberg reporter Patrick Clark and Bloomberg CityLab reporter Kriston Capps join host Sarah Holder on today’s Big Take podcast. (Source: Bloomberg)
content: Trump wants to ban Wall Street investors from buying single-family homes. Would that actually help Americans trying to buy a house? Bloomberg reporter Patrick Clark and Bloomberg CityLab reporter Kriston Capps join host Sarah Holder on today’s Big Take podcast. (Source: Bloomberg)
